synonyms.synonym: Vitamin K-dependent protein C heavy chain
Vitamin K-dependent protein C light chain

protein.specific_function: Protein C is a vitamin K-dependent serine protease that regulates blood coagulation by inactivating factors Va and VIIIa in the presence of calcium ions and phospholipids

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
